data.price: Na tunateremsha katika Qur'ani yaliyo ni matibabu na rehema kwa Waumini. Wala hayawazidishii madhaalimu ila khasara.
data.arabic: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٞ وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا
data.footnotes: Na vipi Haki isiwe na nguvu na hali Sisi tunateremsha katika Qur'ani dawa ya kuponyesha maradhi ya shaka katika vifua vya watu, na sababu za kuwapatia rehema wanao iamini! Na madhaalimu hawana linao wazidia ila khasara tu kwa kuikataa kwao.

dua.name: Dua for Emotional Healing
dua.significanceReason: Seeks spiritual and emotional healing, relief from psychological distress. Frequently used for mental health and emotional well-being.
